name: Slenderman 2021 (Unofficial)
description:
(WARNING - THIS GAME CONTAINS MANY JUMPSCARES)

This is an UNOFFICIAL recreation of the original Slender: The Eight Pages.  I had so much nostalgia when I stumbled upon an old video of it so I decided to remake it in Unreal Engine 5 with photorealistic Quixel Megascans assets.  The graphics have been scaled down in the released game to reduce the package size.

This game is still in development so bugs may be present.  If you find any, comment them below with as much information as you can provide so I can fix them.
